clients.title: Set Up a Short Name on Google My Business!
description: Thereâ€™s a new feature for verified businesses that allows you to assign a short name and URL to your Google My Business listing to make it easier for customers to find you. Please note that the short name can be 32 characters long. You can remove or edit a custom URL up to 3 times per year. Keep in mind that the short name should be associated with your business name. We recommend including your location for that particular listing.
